manifest_description.message: Sporran Lite. The wallet for your credentials.

component_IdentitySuccessOverlay_message.message: You have successfully created a KILT Identity
You have successfully imported your KILT Identity
You have successfully set a new password

component_PasswordField_remember.message: Remember password for the next 15 minutes

component_CredentialCard_delete_warning.message: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?

component_CredentialCard_delete_explanat.message: If you have created a backup of this credential, you can restore it at any time.

component_CredentialCard_revoked_delete_.message: Deleting this credential will remove it from your Sporran wallet.

component_CredentialCard_download_info.message: Backing up your credential saves it to your computer. This is the only way to restore your credential in the event of its loss.

component_UnknownCredential_text.message: The credential $rootHash$ is not recognized by Sporran.

component_UnknownCredential_info.message: This operation is only supported for credentials existing in Sporran.

view_Welcome_noIdentities.message:
You currently don’t have any Identities.
Add your first Identity to get started.

view_Welcome_import.message: Import an Identity from pre-existing phrase

view_Warning_emphasis.message: The next step is very important!

view_Warning_explanation.message: Please write down your wallet’s phrase and keep it in a safe place. We recommend that you write down your backup phrase with pen and paper. The phrase is required to restore your Identity.

view_Warning_emphasis_again.message:
Keep it safe, so you don’t lose
your assets

view_Warning_CTA.message: I understand this – go to the phrase

view_SaveBackupPhrase_explanation.message: Click or hover over each word and write it down. You need to write the words in the correct order from 1 to 12.

view_VerifyBackupPhrase_explanation.message: To make sure you wrote down your backup phrase accurately, sort your phrase in the correct order from 1 to 12.

view_VerifyBackupPhrase_error.message: Please put every word in the correct order

view_ImportBackupPhrase_explanation_impo.message: To import a KILT Identity, you will need your backup phrase consisting of 12 words.

view_ImportBackupPhrase_explanation_rese.message: In order to set a new password you have to re-enter your backup phrase

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_invalid_ba.message: The entered backup phrase doesn’t exist

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_mismatched.message: This is not the backup phrase of this Identity

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_backup_phr.message: Please insert all 12 words of the backup phrase in the correct order

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_typo.message: It looks like there’s a typo in this word

view_CreatePassword_explanation.message: You need a secure password for every Identity. A strong password looks like this:

view_CreatePassword_error_cases.message: You need to use both uppercase and lowercase letters

view_CreatePassword_error_numbers.message: You need to use at least one number

view_CreatePassword_error_other.message: You need to use at least one special character

view_CreatePassword_error_length.message: You need to use at least $minimum$ characters

view_IdentityOverview_download_prompt.message: Some credentials have not been backed up

view_RemoveIdentity_subline.message: You’re about to remove your Identity

view_RemoveIdentity_explanation.message: The next step will remove your Identity from the browser extension. This will not delete your Identity. You can add it again any time by importing your backup phrase.

view_SignQuote_subline.message: Choose an Identity for your credential

view_SignQuote_subline_predetermined.message: The credential will be issued to this Identity

view_SaveCredential_warning.message: Please back up your credential now!

view_ShareCredentialSelect_subline.message: Select a credential to sign and share

view_ShareCredentialSelect_confirm_info.message: You are in the process of presenting a revoked credential. Do you still want to continue?

view_ShareCredentialSign_subline.message: Check the information you’re about to share

view_ShareCredentialSign_error.message: The selected credential has not been attested.

view_AppSettings_warning.message:
When changing the endpoint, the extension needs to close.
Just start it again to continue.

view_AppSettings_attention.message: Attention: connecting to a malicious endpoint may expose your Identities.

view_AuthorizeDApp_subline.message: An application called $name$ is requesting access from:

view_AuthorizeDApp_warning.message: Only approve this request if you trust the application. Approving gives the application access to the addresses of your Identities.

view_ExternalAccess_subline.message: Control which websites can access your Identity names and addresses

view_GenericError_message.message: An error occurred; please try again.

view_ImportCredentials_subline.message: To import your credentials you need your backup files

view_ImportCredentials_wrongFormatInfo.message: Please make sure to upload only JSON files that were previously backed up from your Sporran.

view_ImportCredentials_unknownIdentityIn.message: You uploaded a credential for an identity that is currently not in your Sporran. Please add this identity first and import the credential again.

view_ImportCredentials_unexpectedErrorIn.message: An unexpected error happened. Please try again.

view_DidUpgrade_info.message: After signing you will go to the checkout page to pay with

view_SignDidStart_subline.message: Select your Identity and sign with your password

view_SignDidStart_info_did.message: To proceed you need a DID.

view_SignDidStart_info_credentials.message: Choose whether to attach your credentials to the signature, or sign without credentials.

view_SignDidStart_error_credentials.message: This identity has no attested credentials

view_SignDidCredentialsSelect_subline.message: Select credentials to attach to your signature

view_SignDidExtrinsic_subline.message: Select your Identity and sign with your password

view_SignDidExtrinsic_error_light_did.message: You need to create a DID first

view_SignDidExtrinsic_error_unusable_did.message: This identity’s DID has been removed and is unusable

view_SignDidExtrinsic_endpoint_remove_er.message: No service endpoint found for DID

view_GetDidList_choose.message: Choose at least one Identity with a DID to share

view_AttestationRejected_info.message:
The attestation you requested was rejected.
The credential will likely not be useful in the future.
Do you want to remove it from your Sporran?
